scripts.say: Ahahaha! That's the spirit, Eagle Union carrier! Today's a fine day for getting a good workout!
I still don't like the way you talk, but at least you have some real firepower to back it up.
In any case, we've mopped up the last of the enemies here. Let's keep pressing forward towards the stronghold.
We've got to hurry and join back up with the Commander!
All right! With my inspiration and the technical expertise of the Northern Parliament, we'll be out of here in no time!
Minsk managed to re-establish a link with the commander's fleet just now, and is confirming our route!
Give me a second... we'll go here, and here...
(They managed to break through the Mirror Sea's jamming?! What kind of black magic does the Northern Parliament have...?!)
(Furthermore, I still can't shake the feeling that their rigging resembles the Sirens... I can't help but to be suspicious.)
The Sirens found out about our anti-jamming and is intensifying their disruption. You're going to have to give me the coordinates by hand.
Here you go! As long as we have the coordinates, we'll still be able to join up with the rest of our comrades!
